articles.title: Scott Twine injury latest as Vincent Kompany sees long-term gain from Burnley approach - Lancs Live
articles.description: Twine has not featured since the opening day of the season
articles.content:
Vincent Kompany believes that when Scott Twine returns he will be back for the long haul and play a crucial part in Burnley's season.
